title: Biomedical Sensing Systems
description: A study of physiological sensing topics from a systems viewpoint. Pertinent physiological and electro-physiological concepts will be covered. No prior knowledge of physiology or biology is needed.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3043 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
